short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Book Hunter finds ISBNs on any web page you visit and offers you the best deals available from available online Canadian stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Book Hunter is a Chrome extension that will find ISBNs on any web page you visit and search available Canadian online stores, such as Amazon.ca, to present the best deals to you.

Simply browse to a web page with ISBNs present on it, such as a university's online bookstore, and you will see Book Hunter in action
